episode_event_masaru_gordie_melon/4001_1:
Remember our plan, Raihan!
I’m counting on you to get that weather going!

No hard feelings if the plan slips my mind, right?
You know I run wild in battle!
Let the winds blow! Stream forward, Sandstorm!

You’re unbreakable, Coalossal!
I’ve got absolute faith in you!

They changed the weather so they’d get
an advantage!
Gloria, let’s take Flygon down first.
Flygon’s the one who can start the Sandstorm.
After a while, the Sandstorm will disperse.

Until we can make our attack, let’s defend
with Rillaboom!
That means...

If Rillaboom faints, it’s up to you to take
down Coalossal!
Gotcha!

Oh, seems like you’re all up to
something interesting.
M-Melony?!
Hello there, Raihan! How’ve you been?
Ugh... What a nuisance.

Let us join! It would definitely make for better
training.
Right, Nessa?
Of course. It’s not fair to leave us out.
Oh no... Hey, Victor! Join our team!
It’s an emergency! We need your help!

Then Gloria can join us. Let’s battle Pasio style—
with teams of three!
Be careful, Gloria...

Melony is tough on both her teammates
and her opponents...
Umm...
Welp, this is gonna be rough...
episode_event_masaru_gordie_melon/6801_1:
Er...this doesn’t seem like something an outsider
can resolve...
